title: x/tools/crypto/ssh: handshake: deadlock if other side drops/resets connection during rekeying
body:
The handshakeTransport.readLoop can exit with t.cond locked and any handshakeTransport.writePacket calls will block indefinitely at t.cond.Wait().

Sorry for the confusion - this is not a duplicate of https://github.com/golang/go/issues/11882 (which solves another issue with a possible deadlock in writePacket) as I initially made a mistake of creating a single problem report for two separate issues.
